summary: This is a daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details post assignments, shift changes, and staff statuses (e.g., sick leave, annual leave) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing on a date shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at the MCC on August 10, 2019.

events.title: MCC Daily Staffing Roster
events.description: Assignment of correctional officers and staff to various posts and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It shows numerous staff status changes, including multiple officers on sick leave (Sick Leave: 9) and annual leave (Annual Leave: 8).
Posts relevant to high-security areas are detailed, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), where high-profile inmates like Epstein were held.
The roster includes a 'DRY CELL' post assignment, which is a type of cell used for close observation.
The document provides a baseline of official staffing and assignments at the MCC on a critical date in the Epstein case timeline.
